import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import products from '../products' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import props from 'prop-types' function ProductScreen({}) { const { id } = useParams(); const findproduct=products.find((p)=>p._id===id) //console.log(p._id) //products.print() console.log("hello") console.log(typeof(products)) console.log(products) console.log(match.params.id) return (
Go Back

{findproduct.name}

 Price: Rs. {findproduct.price} Description: {findproduct.description}
) } export default ProductScreen
